definition: with a crash/with a thunderous noise
clamor/noise/(bound form) sound used to call cats
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: In the morning a sea smashed one of the galley doors.
sentences.chinese: 早晨一个巨浪哗啦一声把厨房的一扇门冲坏了。

sentences.english: The bridge collapsed with a great crash.
The tree fell with a great crash .
A sudden splash of water frightened the old man.
sentences.chinese: 忽听哗啦一声水响，老头儿吓了一大跳。

sentences.english: It fell with a loud crash.
I heard crash as the tree fell.
sentences.chinese: 树倒下来时我听到哗啦一声响。

sentences.english: The bottles fell on the floor with a crash.
sentences.chinese: 瓶子哗啦一声掉到地上。

sentences.english: The vase fell crash on to the tiles.
sentences.chinese: 花瓶哗啦一声掉在瓷砖上。

sentences.english: The heavy box landed crash on his head.
sentences.chinese: 沉重的箱子哗啦一声掉到他的头上。

sentences.english: CRASH】The bottles fell on the floor with a crash.
sentences.chinese: 瓶子哗啦一声掉到地上。

sentences.english: The desk lamp fell to the floor with a crash.
sentences.chinese: 台灯哗啦一声掉到地上。

sentences.english: The dishes fell with a smash.
She bumped against the table and sent the crockery crashing to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 她撞在桌子上，使陶器哗啦一声碎落到地上。

sentences.english: A brick crashed through the window.
sentences.chinese: 砖块哗啦一声砸入了窗户。

sentences.english: The vase fell with a smash.
sentences.chinese: 花瓶落在地上，哗啦一声碎了。

sentences.english: The dishes fell to the ground with a crash .
sentences.chinese: 碟子哗啦一声掉在地上。

definition: (onom.) sound of a crash/with a crash
clamor/noise/(bound form) sound used to call cats
(idiom) no sooner said than done/before you know it
pinyin: shuo1 shi2 chi2 , na4 shi2 kuai4

definition: loudly/with a loud bang/a loud rumble
